en: It was my first time going alone so I was super nervous.
ko: 혼자 가는 건 처음이라 엄청 긴장됐었지

en: It was my first time going by myself so I was super excited.
ko: 혼자 가는 건 처음이라 엄청 설레었지

en: It was my first time going without my family so I was super worried.
ko: 가족 없이 혼자 가는 건 처음이라 엄청 걱정됐지

en: I didn't have to ask anyone for permission.
ko: 다른 사람 허락을 안 받아도 됐었어

en: I didn't have to get approval.
ko: 다른 사람 허락을 안 받아도 됐었어

en: I didn't have to run it by anyone.
